text:
:joy:
Man travels  4.5 hours via  jetski from Scottland t the Isle of Man, then walks 25km to see his girlfriend.
He is thrown in jail 2 days later for covid breach, as the Isle of Man is closed to non-residents.
He was in jail for 2 weeks, before being send back to the mainland. (let out early, was meant to be 4)
<https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-isle-of-man-55428761>

attachments.title: Covid breach jet-skier freed from Isle of Man jail
attachments.text: Dale McLaughlan says he is "happy to be going home" after part of his sentence on the Isle of Man.
attachments.fallback: BBC News: Covid breach jet-skier freed from Isle of Man jail

elements.text:
Man travels  4.5 hours via  jetski from Scottland t the Isle of Man, then walks 25km to see his girlfriend.
He is thrown in jail 2 days later for covid breach, as the Isle of Man is closed to non-residents.
He was in jail for 2 weeks, before being send back to the mainland. (let out early, was meant to be 4)

text: ahah brilliant, he thought it would only take 40 minutes.

elements.text: ahah brilliant, he thought it would only take 40 minutes.

text: If he had *just* gone to see his girlfriend, and the two of them had stayed in quarantine for 14 days together, I would have had some sympathy for him, but he was out mixing with other people at bars etc. until they hauled him in.

elements.text: gone to see his girlfriend, and the two of them had stayed in quarantine for 14 days together, I would have had some sympathy for him, but he was out mixing with other people at bars etc. until they hauled him in.

text:
It’s worth noting that the Isle of Mann has basically no covid cases. It has 4 cases in the last 2 weeks (for its population of about 85K).
It also has a tiny hospital (~350 beds), and its *annoying* to do transfers.

It is also worth noting that it is a separate legal jurisdiction to the UK, with its own laws.
Like the ability to close its boarders.

I kinda have some sympathy for the guy since he did isolate at home for 2 weeks before hand.
But it they just let people in on the fact that they said they isolated at home, they would be overwelmed with people visiting one of the places with by far the lowest cases in the UK, and with the least ability to deal with it. And some of those are going to be lying.

text: mostly though I just laugh at him doing this incredibly misguided epic journey, only to be stuck in the slammer basically as soon as he arrived and then shipped back to the mainland

text: Lying, yes, like the guy who went on the United flight and then died of COVID during the trip

text: You don’t have to take a very large sample here in the US lately, to find that, sadly enough!

attachments.title: How do I get to China? Jet ski! Google Maps joke gives users unorthodox instructions for crossing the Pacific
attachments.text: Users who ask the search engine for directions for how to get from Japan to China are being given somewhat unusual advice.
attachments.fallback: Mail Online: How do I get to China? Jet ski! Google Maps joke gives users unorthodox instructions for crossing the Pacific
